message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm asking for $115. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $100, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $100 is a tempting offer, I know the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $107?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $107 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
